articles.title: Biden's momentous 72 hours in Europe steels the West for the next stage of Russia's war in Ukraine - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden barely slept as he rolled in the dark toward Kyiv earlier this week, sitting awake as his curtained-off train car crossed into the warzone that has come to shape so much of his presidency.

articles.title: Russia will never win in Ukraine, Biden vows - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: United States President Joe Biden was due to meet eastern European leaders on Wednesday, a day after vowing Russia would never see victory in Ukraine.

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: Microsoft makes case for Activision merger amid EU scrutiny - The Star Online
articles.description: Microsoft's Xbox video game division on Tuesday announced new partnerships with Nintendo and chipmaker Nvidia as it tries to persuade European regulators to approve its planned US$68.7bil (RM304.7bil) takeover of game publishing giant Activision Blizzard.

articles.title: China and Europe team up on tests before joint space mission in 2025 - South China Morning Post
articles.description: It marks first time a satellite made in China is shipped to European Space Agency, and for a Chinese team to help assemble and test at an ESA facility.
